verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Amazing Grace shall always
be my song of praise,
For it was Grace that
bought my liberty
I do not know just how
He came to love me so
He looked beyond my faults
and saw my needs

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
I shall forever lift
my eyes to Calvary,
to view the cross where
Jesus gave His life for me,
how marvelous the Grace
that caught my falling soul
He looked beyond my
faults and saw my needs

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It was God's Grace that
brought me out of darkness
and to the light where
I can clearly see
I'll shout it from the mountains
and the valleys
He looked beyond my faults
and saw my needs
